StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertUpdateCandidate_PJ_1_9_13]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @PersonID int, @BirthDate date.me, @Ci.zenshipStatusID varchar(2), @CountryOfOriginCode varchar(3), @DL_Expira.on date.me = null, @DL_Number varchar(20) = null, @DL_StateCode varchar(2) = null, @EthnicID varchar(2), @Gender char(1), @MaritalStatusID char(1), @MepcomEthnicID char(1), @MepcomRaceID char(1), @RaceID char(1), @ReligionID varchar(2), @BestTimeToContact varchar(200) = null, @LastEditBy varchar(50) ) AS
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [mcriss].[dbo].[MARINE_CANDIDATE_PJ] WHERE [MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] = @PersonID) BEGIN UPDATE [mcriss].[dbo].[MARINE_CANDIDATE_PJ] SET [MARITAL_STATUS_CODE] = @MaritalStatusID ,[RACE_CODE] = @RaceID ,[ETHNIC_CODE] = @EthnicID ,[GENDER_CODE] = @Gender ,[RELIGION_CODE] = (CASE WHEN @ReligionID IS NULL THEN [RELIGION_CODE] ELSE @ReligionID END) --,[POPULATION_GROUP_CODE] = ,[DATE_OF_BIRTH] = @BirthDate ,[CITIZENSHIP] = @Ci.zenshipStatusID ,[COUNTRY_OF_ORIGIN] = (CASE WHEN @ReligionID IS NULL THEN [COUNTRY_OF_ORIGIN] ELSE @CountryOfOriginCode END) --,[BIRTH_CITY] = --,[BIRTH_COUNTY] = --,[BIRTH_STATE] = ,[DRIVER_LICENSE_STATE] = (CASE WHEN @ReligionID IS NULL THEN [DRIVER_LICENSE_STATE] ELSE @DL_StateCode END) ,[DRIVER_LICENSE_NUM] = (CASE WHEN @ReligionID IS NULL THEN [DRIVER_LICENSE_NUM] ELSE @DL_Number END) ,[DRIVER_LICENSE_EXP] = (CASE WHEN @ReligionID IS NULL THEN [DRIVER_LICENSE_EXP] ELSE @DL_Expira.on END) --,[INTERVIEW_DATE] = ,[USER_LOGIN] = @LastEditBy ,[UPDATE_DATE] = GetDate() --,[rowguid] = ,[MEPCOM_RACE_CODE] = @MepcomRaceID ,[MEPCOM_ETHNIC_CODE] = @MepcomEthnicID ,[BestTimeToContact] = @BestTimeToContact WHERE [MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] = @PersonID END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [mcriss].[dbo].[MARINE_CANDIDATE_PJ] ([MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] ,[MARITAL_STATUS_CODE] ,[RACE_CODE] ,[ETHNIC_CODE] ,[GENDER_CODE] ,[RELIGION_CODE] ,[POPULATION_GROUP_CODE] ,[DATE_OF_BIRTH] ,[CITIZENSHIP] ,[COUNTRY_OF_ORIGIN] ,[BIRTH_CITY] ,[BIRTH_COUNTY] ,[BIRTH_STATE] ,[DRIVER_LICENSE_STATE] ,[DRIVER_LICENSE_NUM] ,[DRIVER_LICENSE_EXP] ,[INTERVIEW_DATE] ,[USER_LOGIN] ,[UPDATE_DATE] ,[rowguid] ,[MEPCOM_RACE_CODE] ,[MEPCOM_ETHNIC_CODE] ,[BestTimeToContact]) VALUES (@PersonID ,@MaritalStatusID ,@RaceID ,@EthnicID ,@Gender ,@ReligionID ,null ,@BirthDate ,@Ci.zenshipStatusID ,@CountryOfOriginCode ,null ,null ,null ,@DL_StateCode ,@DL_Number ,@DL_Expira.on ,null ,@LastEditBy ,GetDate() ,newid() ,@MepcomRaceID ,@MepcomEthnicID ,@BestTimeToContact) END
